mapper.sql: mailList_id as mailListId,contacts as contacts,phone_Number as phoneNumber,remarks as remarks, admin_id as adminId,modification_Time as modificationTime,create_Time as createTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `tb_mailList` ( contacts, phone_Number, remarks, admin_id, create_Time ) VALUES (#{contacts},#{phoneNumber},#{remarks},#{adminId},#{createTime});
mapper.select: select * from tb_mailList order by create_time desc
